Flower Gift

Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies in harsh sunlight.

Level-Up

The following Pokémon can equip this ability after reaching a certain level.
# Pokémon Type Level
361 Cacnea 70
362 Cacturne
70
